title: 3 years in Customer Service Experience
job_overview:
Job Overview

We are looking for a skilled and dedicated Customer Service Representative with extensive BPO/Call Center experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should have at least 3 years of customer service experience, demonstrating a strong ability to provide excellent support and resolve complex customer issues. This role requires a high level of professionalism, communication skills, and problem-solving abilities.

Key Responsibilities:

- Provide exceptional customer support through phone and email.
- Resolve customer inquiries, complaints, and issues efficiently and professionally.
- Handle escalated cases and offer expert solutions to ensure customer satisfaction.
- Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and follow-ups.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve issues and improve processes.
- Identify and report on trends to help improve overall customer service experience.
- Ensure adherence to company policies and customer service standards.
- Answer inbound calls and provide assistance to clients
- Transfer calls to the proper teaUpgrade to see actual infomber
- Making outbound calls to reach out to potential clients
- Processing payments
- Other duties as assigned

Qualifications:

- Minimum 3 years of experience in a customer service role (must be coming from a BPO company).
- Excellent verbal and written communication abilities.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle high-volume inquiries.
- A positive attitude with a strong commitment to customer satisfaction.
- Open to feedback and improvement.
- Willing to learn new skills and knowledge
- Able to handle stressful situations
- Ability to adapt to change and a fast paced environment

Preferred Skills:

- Strong Customer Service / BPO / Admin / Call Center Experience
- Experience handling escalations and complex customer issues.
- Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills.
- Proficient in Microsoft Office
- Strong organizational skills and Ability to Multitask.
- Bilingual or multilingual skills are a plus.

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary
- Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
- A supportive and collaborative work environment.
- Permanent Work From Home
- Fixed weekends off
- Early out every Friday
- Work Life Balance
- Training provided
- Opportunity for bonuses (Depending on performance)
- Stability

MUST HAVES - If you don’t match the following criteria, unfortunately, we are not a match
- Strong Internet Connection
- Back-up Power Source
- Back up internet source
- Noise Canceling Headset
- 100 MBPS above internet speed
- LAN Cable for internet
